item.title: Code Study - unixODBC
item.description: How Log Works config - __handles.c:__alloc_env() SQLGetPrivateProfileString: odbcinst.ini ODBC.Trace [1Y].*|ON dm_log_open( "ODBC", tracing_file, 1/0 ); log/action __info.c: dm_log_open(prog_name, file_name, pid_logging); // only save log info dm_log_write(file, line, type, severity, message); // do actual log file write Conclusion unixodbc use odbc.ini, defined by $ODBCINI of full path, for most configuration trace setiings defined by odbcinst.ini [ODBC] Trace = Yes # alternative: 1, ON TraceFile = /full/path/to/file # optional # TracePid = Yes odbcinst.
